"<%me>!<br>I got it! I figured it out!": "I've worked out why everyone's having trouble giving out chocolate!"
"It's so simple! It's because they're not confident about the quality of their chocolate!"
"No matter how delicious it is, if it looks boring, they'll be nervous about giving it to someone else..."
"So, how can someone decorate their chocolate so it looks amazing? I need your help to get some ideas!"
